trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o controle que redistribui espaço entre colunas ou linhas de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O controle GridSplitter redistribui espaço entre linhas ou colunas em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>sem alterar as dimensões de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um GridSplitter redimensiona duas colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>propriedade de uma coluna é aumentada e, ao mesmo tempo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>propriedade da outra coluna é reduzida pela mesma quantia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra como definir um GridSplitter horizontal ou vertical, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades e deixando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>propriedades definidas para seus valores padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **Como criar controles de GridSplitter verticais e horizontais** | Tipo de GridSplitter | o valor de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>| o valor de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Redimensiona linhas | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Redimensiona as colunas | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>for maior que ou igual a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isso redimensiona as colunas.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>for menor que <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isso redimensiona linhas. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| Um GridSplitter pode se sobrepor a uma linha ou coluna que contém outros tipos de conteúdo ou ele pode ocupar uma linha ou coluna por si só.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como definir um GridSplitter, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>as configurações de propriedade não obtêm o comportamento de GridSplitter desejado, você pode alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>as configurações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Um GridSplitter pode ser encoberto por outros objetos que estão contidos na <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como evitar essa situação, consulte [como: Verifique se um GridSplitter é visível](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância mínima que um usuário deve arrastar o mouse para redimensionar linhas ou colunas com um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: A distância mínima que é definida por DragIncrement é reinicializada continuamente como o usuário arrasta o mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você arrasta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>pela quantidade DragIncrement, as linhas ou colunas são redimensionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar linhas e colunas mais, você deve arrastar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>a mesma quantidade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as alterações nos tamanhos de coluna e linha são feitos usando o mouse ou o teclado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>são feitas em múltiplos do DragIncrement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa a distância mínima que um usuário deve usar o mouse para arrastar um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> para redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância em que cada que você pressiona uma tecla de seta move uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: A distância que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> move para cada que você pressiona uma tecla de seta.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 10.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria a implementação de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tecla é pressionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle perde o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração nas dimensões do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controle determina que tipo de ponteiro para exibir após seu <xref:System.Windows.Size>está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a alteração no tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo que personaliza a aparência, efeitos ou outras características de estilo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> indicador de visualização de controle que é exibida quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>estiver definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define estilos, há algumas restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos e modelagem](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `ResourceExtension` um dos seguintes: `StaticResource` ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`A chave que identifica o estilo que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sintaxe de elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [modelos e estilos in-line](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência de associação usando ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>também é possível, mas raro.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | Uma visualização das alterações dos limites de linha ou coluna é exibida enquanto a usuário arrasta a controle e o está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Os limites de linha e coluna são definidos quando o usuário libera o botão do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> para o indicador de visualização que mostra a possibilidade de alterar em <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> dimensões à medida que você move o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o estilo que fornece o tema atual.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quais colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas em relação a coluna ou linha para a qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle está definido.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: Se você não pode obter o comportamento desejado, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades, altere o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>ou valores padrão de ResizeBehavior.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que indica quais colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas nisso <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle redimensiona linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se você não pode obter o comportamento desejado, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades, altere o ResizeDirection ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>valores padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica se é redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle atualiza o tamanho de coluna ou linha, como o usuário arrasta o controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>requer um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>esteja presente na árvore de seu pai para exibir comentários de visualização de arrastar.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito é atendido normalmente com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto que está disponível no estilo padrão para o <xref:System.Windows.Window>ou o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto criado por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se nenhuma desses estiver disponível, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controle deve definir seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | Quando a propriedade ShowsPreview é definida como `true`, é mostrada uma visualização da alteração nos tamanhos de linha ou coluna.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>é liberado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade é definida como `false`, os tamanhos de coluna ou linha são atualizados em tempo real quando a usuário arrasta a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o teclado é usado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>tamanhos de controle, a coluna ou linha são atualizados em tempo real, mesmo que a propriedade ShowsPreview está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> visualização é exibido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
